contents.text: Thank you for calling SmartBiz Loans in San Francisco, your partner for SBA loans from one hundred fifty to three hundred fifty thousand dollars at competitive rates.
To prequalify online for a six point two five to seven point two five percent SBA loan ranging from one fifty to three fifty thousand dollars, press 1.
To check your existing prequalification status, press 1.
Please hold while we retrieve your prequalification details. A representative will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: Verify the status of my SBA loan prequalification
Check if I'm still prequalified for an SBA loan for my veteran-owned business.
I need to retrieve the status of my SBA loan prequalification online.
I want to check the status of my SBA loan prequalification.
Retrieve the status of my existing SBA loan prequalification.

contents.text: To start a new loan application, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our online application team.

navigationGoals: Begin a new SBA loan application
Start a new SBA loan application to expand my veteran-led small business.
I want to initiate a new SBA loan application for $150K–$350K at your advertised rates.
I need help starting a new SBA loan application.
Initiate a new SBA loan application online.

contents.text: To speak with a loan specialist, press 2.
For questions about loan terms and rates, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a specialist for terms and rate information.

navigationGoals: Ask a specialist about SBA loan rates and terms
Ask about current SBA loan rates and terms for veteran entrepreneurs.
I need to review the APR, interest schedule, and amortization terms for your SBA loans.
I have questions about loan terms and interest rates and need to speak with someone.
Discuss detailed loan terms and interest rates with a specialist.

contents.text: For support with an existing application, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our application support team.

navigationGoals: Get help with my existing SBA loan application
Get help with my ongoing SBA loan application for my veteran-owned business.
I’m experiencing a validation error on my in-progress SBA loan application and need technical support.
I need assistance with my current loan application.
Obtain support for my current SBA loan application.
